name: FISHING STROLL
description:
FISHING STROLL is a game about.. Fishing ! But not only..

You can explore this tiny world and meet it's habitants! I'm sure you can help them by grabbing what they lost or what they need. You can grab anything with this hook! It's a great power in your hands, and with great power, come great fishs!

Maybe we should have named our game "GRABBING STROLL SUPER" after all..

Here's a list of what you can do in this game:

  • FISHING
  • MOVING
  • SPEAKING TO HUMANOÏDS
  • ENJOYING YOURSELF

You can control your actions with your keyboard arrows. You can also use "Z" to fish and "X" to interact with a character.

Made for the GBJAM

We may update our game, soon or never. Keep in touch these weeks!

WE HOPE YOU'LL LOVE THIS LITTLE ADVENTURE !!

And yea.. "Fishs".. There's none actually. Maybe later ;)
